udaharana lesin dakwanne nam, madhyayan haraha wana himikarithwaya, tharagakarithwa nithiya magin walakwiya haka: - pawara ganim ha eekabaddha kirim waladi madhya pilibanda adhikariyaka aniwarya madihathwima (udaharana lesin dakwanne nam, tharagakarithwa adhikariya madhya adhikariye upades pathimata bandi sitima); - madhya bahuwidhathawaya (nathinam poduwe mahajana bandiyawa) karana kota ganimin, sankendranayak sandaha awasara labadima tharagakarithwa adhikariya magin nishprabha kirime hakiyawa; nithiya thula madhya wetha wisheshitha widhiwidhana nopawathinne wuwath, eyin nithiye wishaya pathayen madhya kshethraya iwath nowe.
